title: Can't download League after deleting when "unspecified errors" and support links broken?
body:
Broken Support links that I can't access:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I can't seem to download the client at all beside some links that load up the emblem in the middle of the screen and don't load the launcher at all.
When I click https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload nothing happens after choosing Mac OSX OCE.
I've tried turning on and off my computer a couple times and using an old download I had from a long time ago but nothing has worked.

Riot help please this is really frustrating me and I hope to get this sorted out.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This definitely sounds like a DNS issue to me, try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4) and let me know if that helps at all.

How do I do that? I'm on a mac and that link didn't help cus it came up with 

This webpage is not available
DNS_PROBE_FINISHED_NXDOMAIN
The server at support.riotgames.com can't be found, because the DNS lookup failed. DNS is the network service that translates a website's name to its Internet address. This error is most often caused by having no connection to the Internet or a misconfigured network. It can also be caused by an unresponsive DNS server or a firewall preventing Google Chrome from accessing the network.

Sorry about that, it completely slipped my mind that you weren't able to load the support site.

CHANGING TO PUBLIC DNS

* Open System Preferences
* Open the Network preference pane
* Select the active connection on the left, and click the "Advanced..." button in the lower right hand corner
* Click "DNS" from the selection bar.
* Remove any current DNS entries, and input the following public DNS servers:

> 8.8.8.8 
> 8.8.4.4

* Save your changes by selecting "OK"
* Apply the changes by clicking "Apply" in the lower right hand corner
